name: mt_MAT_00_Extract_HRCHY_XREF
description: @connectionSource= MDM Hosted, @connectionTarget= S3 Bucket, @transformation= Read HRCHY table from MDM and write in S3 Bucket, @dataType= Hierarchy table, @sources=[@connection1= ORC_HMDM_READ_MATERIALS], @targets=[@connection1= S3_HMDM_V2_HostedAgent], @description= Mapping task for DL Extract

parameters.name: $Src_MDM_S3$
parameters.label: Conn_MDM (Conn_MDM)
parameters.customQuery:
SELECT C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY,
C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF.MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER,  
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L1 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L1,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L2 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L2,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L3 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L3,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L4 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L4,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L5 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L5,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_L6 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L6,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N1 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N1,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N2 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N2,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N3 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N3,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N4 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N4,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N5 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N5,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_N6 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N6,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_ID AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_ID,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_HRCHY_NM AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_NAME,
C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.LANG_KEY AS LANGUAGE_KEY

FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF
INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF
ON MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF.ROWID_XREF = MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_MSTR_FK

inOutParameters.name: p_Src_MDM
inOutParameters.currentValue: SELECT C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY, MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER, PRDCT_HRCHY_L1 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L1, PRDCT_HRCHY_L2 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L2, PRDCT_HRCHY_L3 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L3, PRDCT_HRCHY_L4 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L4, PRDCT_HRCHY_L5 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L5, PRDCT_HRCHY_L6 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_L6, PRDCT_HRCHY_N1 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N1, PRDCT_HRCHY_N2 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N2, PRDCT_HRCHY_N3 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N3, PRDCT_HRCHY_N4 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N4, PRDCT_HRCHY_N5 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N5, PRDCT_HRCHY_N6 AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_N6, PRDCT_HRCHY_ID AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_ID, PRDCT_HRCHY_NM AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY_NAME, LANG_KEY AS LANGUAGE_KEY FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF ON MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF.ROWID_XREF = MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.PRDCT_MSTR_FK WHERE C_BO_PRDCT_HRCHY_XREF.last_update_date> TO_TIMESTAMP('29-05-25 00:00:00.000','DD-MM-YY HH24:MI.SSXFF')
